definition: second of the ten Heavenly Stems 十天干[shi2 tian1 gan1]/second in order/letter "B" or Roman "II" in list "A, B, C", or "I, II, III" etc/second party (in legal contract, usually 乙方[yi3 fang1], as opposed to 甲方[jia3 fang1])/ethyl/bent/winding/radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 5)/ancient Chinese compass point: 105°
turning stroke (in Chinese characters)/see also 折[zhe2]

sentences.english: But the liver of Hepatitis B disobeys the virtue of General.
sentences.chinese: 故乙肝病人其肝大違將軍之德。

sentences.english: One class of interferons is used to treat chronic infection with HBV and HCV.
sentences.chinese: 其中一類的干擾素常被用來治療乙肝或丙肝感染。

sentences.english: Occurrence liver of second liver patient is sclerotic , can be ascites still treated?
sentences.chinese: 乙肝患者出現肝硬化，腹水還能治療好嗎？

sentences.english: Objective To study the correlation between cholelithiasis and the infection of HBV.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討乙肝病毒感染在膽石症發病中的作用。

sentences.english: In conclusion, we confirm the efficacy of long-term HBIG immunoprophylaxis.
sentences.chinese: 結論是我們確認了長期接種乙肝免疫球蛋白的療效。

sentences.english: Does my body have bit of puffiness not merely with second liver disappear noisy?
sentences.chinese: 我的身體有點虛胖不只和乙肝有沒影響？

sentences.english: Objective To construct an expression system of HBsAg in ginseng cells.
sentences.chinese: 目的建立乙肝病毒表面抗原的人蔘細胞表達系統。

sentences.english: The 366 cases in the second group received standard hepatitis B vaccine injection alone.
sentences.chinese: 單用組366例，爲單用標準乙肝疫苗注射。

sentences.english: Examination of child second liver turns how enzymatic tall, exterior antibody is electropositive , how to do?
sentences.chinese: 小孩乙肝檢查轉安酶高，表面抗體陽性，怎麼辦？

sentences.english: Objective To study the anti-HBV effect of ethanol extract from Styelec plicata Lesueur in vitro.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究皺瘤海鞘乙醇提取物的體外抗乙肝病毒作用。

sentences.english: Conclusion The oxymatrine has the strong anti-HBV virus function.
sentences.chinese: 結論苦蔘素具有較強抗乙肝病毒作用。

sentences.english: Conclusion:The traditional medicine has positive effect on CHB, it is worth spreading.
sentences.chinese: 結論中醫藥治療慢性乙肝療效好，值得推廣。

sentences.english: Virus translocation was also reduced in the presence of HBV immunoglobulin.
sentences.chinese: 乙肝免疫球蛋白的存在也減少了病毒的轉運。

sentences.english: BB Doctor at birth did not take your baby's cord blood has not B search.
sentences.chinese: BB出生時醫生也沒取孩子的臍帶血查有否乙肝。

sentences.english: The most serious consequence of hepatitis B and C infection in humans is liver cancer.
sentences.chinese: 人類感染乙肝和丙肝肝炎病毒的最嚴重的結果是肝癌。

sentences.english: Hepatitis B is the most common serious cause of liver infection and a leading cause of liver cancer.
sentences.chinese: 乙肝是最嚴重的肝部感染，是肝癌的主要原因。

definition: human immune deficiency virus (HIV)/the AIDS virus
HIV/see also 愛滋病毒|爱滋病毒[ai4 zi1 bing4 du2]
AIDS (loanword)/see also 愛滋病|爱滋病[ai4 zi1 bing4]
